title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Exploring Colloid Concepts through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Classify and explain the definitions, categories, and properties of colloids in three or more distinct ways
Students can explain colloidal phenomena by connecting them to five or more everyday examples.
Students can perform colloidal experiment simulations with 90% accuracy using a gamification app interface.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
